content.label: This game is great...9yrs ago when the last roster was updated. Please upgrade!

Incredibly disappointed. Bought this game to play 1 v 1 on a long road trip. However, the game lacks Bluetooth multiplayer, a function it FALSELY CLAIMS to have. False advertising. A scam. Wish I could get my money back.
I grew up on this game, and playing it again brings back tons of memories. This would be 5 stars if they would update the rosters. PLEASE UPDATE THE ROSTERS

First off I wanna say I’ve been a nba jam fan since the beginning. Just about every version has passed through my hands and I must say I love this mobile version. I can deal with the outdated rosters although an update would be nice. I really want game pad support added. That’s the only reason I leave 4 out of 5
Update the roster the game would be aye five star
Keeps crashing and erasing my game
It would be better if there were updates on the teams like the current and the old teams

title.label: Please make it for Apple TV

content.label: The only thing you could do to improve this classic is upgrade it to be played on the Apple TV......
Come on EA. Update.

There is no button to call for a shove. That would be nice to have along with team fire after alley-oops are performed.

If team fire is added there should be a play meter to perform their best dunk play because the cpu player doesn’t know how to go for an alley-oop often or set me up for a alley-oop.

The quarter tilt and spin dunks should be added more often. The default dunk is boring and the fire dunks shouldn’t always be so high it slows the game down. 

If your not going to update the rosters at least add the instructions of how to do each dunk on purpose in jam camp. So we can use them in game play.

Sliding up from turbo to dunk does not work, its passing the ball. And alley-oop dunks should be better.

#ChicagoBulls!!

✨✨🛸
Thank u
I think this game is really fun and has lots of potential but I feel I have been waiting for an update for 5-6 years and it still hasn’t happened.

title.label: Could be one of the best!!

content.label: This game could be one of the best games right now. Just like for any console NBA Jam has that staying power. What’s holding this version back you ask. MFi controller support is the only thing. The game is classic, it’s smooth, and it’s just fun plain and simple. I played around with it the first couple days after buying because I figured being EA that it would have controller support. Well that what I get for making assumptions. Spent 4.99 and probably have played 2 games. So cmon EA. Every other game has MFi controller support, why you letting this classic crash and burn??

This game is great and very user friendly to play! Brings back a lot of nostalgia from my youth. However, update the d@mn rosters! I think it would add a little more excitement if I was using my team with it’s current roster as opposed to the roster from 10 years ago🤦🏽‍♂️

title.label: Has potential, but no updated teams.

content.label: This game has a lot of potential. Unfortunately, seems like creators abandoned it. Sad because I'm sure lots of people would flock back to it if teams were updated. NBA Jam is a classic.
When will you add the 45th President, Donald J Trump, and VP Pence?
Please update this game...needs updated rosters

I’m ok with the fact they’ve practically never updated the teams with player who have left or been traded so on and so forth. For heavens sake EA Sports please get with the times and make it to where you can use a controller....
Nice game & great gameplay but rosters are never updated. It’s not fair to the customers. Great game otherwise
I regret buying this.

The game is superb! Don’t let the negative reviews make you second guess getting this game. If you’ve played it on Xbox 360 and or Xbox One, you’ll enjoy playing it on your iphone. And of course, if you’ve never played it before, you’re in for a treat. BOOM SHAKALAKA!

title.label: I don’t get the negative reviews

content.label: Super fun game and they captured the feel of the old NBA Jam from my youth. Hope they update rosters one day. Also one critique would be to make legends difficulty mode a little harder.
NBA is one of my favorite games but could use some improvements. First it really needs updated rosters. Another thing I would like to see is more challenges and things to customize gameplay.
IT NEEDS AN ONLINE PVP MODE!! HOW HAS THIS GAME BEEN OUT FOR ALMOST A DECADE AND STILL HAS NO ONLINE?!
ITS ALMOST PERFECT!!! NEED MORE BULLS PLAYERS!!!!! Where’s Pipen? Jordan? Kukoc?
可以很棒，爱了爱了，操作细节，显示细腻

Updated roster, allowed us to trade with other teams, allowed use to add more time, it's crashed a lot on the iPhone 11 and iOS 13, add 2020 nba roster on each team, add celebrities to be added to different teams, add more old players like Michael Jordan, Charles Barkley, Reggie Miller, Wilt Chamberlain, Kareem Abdul-Jabbar, Terry Porter, Bill Walton, Dikembe Mutombo, and others, add out door play grounds, better announcer, and introduction of home team players. Update update update update!!!!!!!!
This game is amazing, but we need a roster update and just an overall update for this game ASAP!

I like this game but could you please add new rosters and controller support?

I’ll rate it... 5 STARS if u do.

This game need a update 
they need to put all this players changed teams like lebron and love in cleveland
paul gasol in the bulls all the changes need to be on time in this game and the rates by teams all the overals by teams all this little things are going to make this game funner to play more and more... 

Back again with a new review coment, If EA SPORTS are not willing to updated the game, I lest made a new version of NBA JAM for mobile, this one with all the new updates on the NBA.
Fun game but really would prefer if I could use a controller.
Please update rosters 😭😭😭best game ever but it hasn’t changed at all

I’m a Knicks fan so the 2012 roster is great compared to what we have now in 2020. But, I am begging you, update the roster already. Soooo man great players in the league today. I’m sure all NBA Jam fans would appreciate it. I bet all those people who deleted the app will re-download.

Who ever programmed this game should have their hands cut off!! This stupid game glitches all over the place. You hit the turbo button and your guy jumps or shoots. You try to pass and nothing. It gets worse if you build a lead and are trying for triple digits (which I know NBA Jam gets harder when you have a lead in order to keep it close, but it shouldn’t come at the cost of buttons not working). Already broke my screen on my phone chucking it out of frustration from this dopey game. SAVE YOUR MONEY and play a version on a console
They Could Have Atleast Updated The Game And Fixed The Multiplayer Problems But THATS HOW THEY TREAT THEIR CUSTOMER!!!
Is this game ever gonna get updates or something because it’s a great game just super old
Great game, plays like the classic, but update the rosters you cowards!!!!!

title.label: Good, fun, but slacking on updates

content.label: This game is off the chain, my only issue is the rosters being waaaaay out of date and the player ratings being off. Improved players still have rookie ratings lol
UPDATE

I brought this game to online with other real people and even that don’t work so I payed for it again on another phone just to see if I connect to the same WiFi maybe that was the issue and still no results seriously fix this, on top of that I’m with everyone else on UPDATING the players I really don’t see why I bother paying for this game if nothing is going to change
MAKE CURRENT ROSTERS JEEZ ITS A $5 GAME!!!! DO NOT BUY UNTIL THEY UPDATE ROSTERS!!!!
There is no controller support 👎
I like the game but have to give one star because of no controller support and never a roster update
Why r u saying updated rosters when KD is still on the Thunder?
One of the best basketball mobile game ever
Just update the rosters and this game will be amazingggg🤩🤩
Can we please get the Sonics back with Kemp and Payton. Also where is Scottie Pippen? Just bring back the retro game as well .
I personally love this game, me and my son play it everyday and we have a special bond now because I play it with him. 5 stars. -Chad
Good game but I am trying to play multiplayer with my dad and brother and it seems not to work maybe you guys can do a patch because multiplayer does not work

title.label: Great game but needs updated rosters

content.label: Please EA Sports you guys keep making updates but could you guys please just update the rosters on here, people love playing this game and I know everyone wants a roster update because it’s what makes the game better and more entertaining for us to play, there also needs to be an online mode where you can play against everyone not just a friend, cmon step it up.
